programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Wanda thinks Jason has been visiting the pancake house for more than pancakes! Carl’s fling Melanie has a big secret about his sister’s man! Dave’s girlfriend Shannon has been sleeping with a stripper!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Ariana's friend wants her to dump her boyfriend for him; Samantha goes on strike because she fears that her boyfriend is cheating.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Tish finds bad news while snooping through her friend's cell phone; Kalia wants Victoria's boyfriend; CJ blames his wife for his infidelity.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Jeff met Chrissy during a beer robbery, but he never imagined she’d be sexually aggressive! Now he wants out! Shawn has to come clean to his fiancée Latisha after his one night stand! Tyrell is over Jill and ready to be with her godsister, Nicky!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Anita is ready to dump her husband for her ex-lover. Next Theresa is cheating on her fiancé with his brother! Later Kevin is here to ell his girlfriend's ex, Jermaine, to back off.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Audrina is prepared to get to the bottom of rumors that her boyfriend slept with her strip-club co-worker; Ashley's husband wants her permission to have sex with other women; Stephanie's revelation may ruin her bond with her newfound sister.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Destiny confronts her friend about trespassing on other people's property; a confession of epic proportions could be a deal breaker; a hidden secret may alter a couple's plans.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Pamela is here today to tell her best friend, Terri, that she is sleeping with her son, Brandon. Next Deaire has been sleeping with Brenda’s 62-year-old mother! Then Brandi will tell her fiancé that she's been having an affair with twin brothers!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.sub-title: She Took My Man ... and My Car!
programme.desc: Strippers Precious and Jewels have too much in common; John learns that his friend is responsible for the downturn in his marriage; DJ's girlfriend wants to see other people.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.sub-title: I'm Leaving You For My Dream Girl
programme.desc: Geeky Ben finally got with his dream girl and now wants to leave his girlfriend Brittany. Katie ended up sleeping with best friend Julie’s man on a camping trip, but he’s got his own secret. Tina took over her friend Leanne’s house and husband!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: CeCe is here to tell her girlfriend, Michelle, that she is cheating with PJ who's a man! Next Silas is here to tell his girlfriend that he's been cheating with her best friend! Then Mark recently caught his fiance, Liz, in bed with her lover, Angie!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Unemployed Sebastian has been badgering his girlfriend, Dee, for months to become a stripper and star in adult films. Later Steve tells his girlfriend that he's secretly been videotaping their sex sessions and broadcasting them over the Internet!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.sub-title: A Dad, Tacos & the Kung Fu Kid
programme.desc: A man finds out his wife is having sex with their son-in-law; a man cheats with one of his girlfriend's best friends; a man suspects his girlfriend is cheating with his friend.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Our guests today have been wrapped around their lovers fingers and their finally ready to put a ring on it.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.sub-title: Sisters Pregnant by the Same Man
programme.desc: Our cameras were at home with sisters Olivia and Catherine when Olivia confronted her older sister for sleeping with her boyfriend, Jacob. Next Jeromy has been having an affair with 2 sisters and both are now pregnant!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Rashelle's here to find out how close Jessica and Richard have really become. Then, Sean says that his dream is to marry his fiancee Jessica by the lake. But before the couple takes the plunge, he's got to get some secrets off of his chest

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Angelica is unapologetic about sleeping with her twin's boyfriend; Makayla confronts the woman with whom her children's father hooked up; Stormy wants to take a shower with her friend Jessica.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Mike is ready to end his relationship with his girlfriend because of her jealous ways; Jared admits a secret; Barry hopes to prove to an exotic dancer that he is not a typical customer and wants a chance at love.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Wayne doesn't know his fiancee, Kristin, is sleeping with her cousin! Next Springer Cam is there when JB drops the bomb on both of his girlfriends and tells them he's been cheating. Later Vinnie is sleeping with his best friend's fiancee, Shannon.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: After seven years of marriage and four kids, Evren and Crystal are still cheating on each other. Can their future really look any brighter! Then Sarah's not about to lose her first love Jeremy, but his cheating ways are reaching a boiling point!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: A man suspects his girlfriend is sleeping with his uncle; a woman's boyfriend cheats with her friend.

programme.title: Jerry Springer

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Things were going great with his new girlfriend until Roger found himself in bed with her friend; Kandy's boyfriend reveals a secret that could change her generous ways; Dannisha's boyfriend continues to beg for a threesome.

programme.desc: Stripper Brittany confronts a co-worker who hooked up with one of Brittany's clients; Bebo's baby-mama confesses to sleeping with his best friend; three guests provide a surprise.

programme.desc: A woman thinks she is entitled to sleep with her mother's boyfriend since she is the sole breadwinner in the family.
